DryadDataFile.dcterms:title: Tajima's D for 10Kbp windows for six L. pustulata populations
DryadDataFile.dcterms:description: Tajima's D output for 10Kbp windows for six populations of Lasallia pustulata along an elevational cline. "na" indicates windows that fail the coverage criteria.
